oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-08-07 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-08-07 part 2. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Bern Bennett, starring Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and his orchestra, and featuring the Johnny Burnette Trio, Gene Vincent and his Blue Caps, and Otis Williams and the Charms. Produced and directed by Lou Melamed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Sam "The Man" Taylor; Gene Vincent; Blue Caps
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Alan Freed introduces Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and the orchestra -- Real Gone (Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and orchestra) -- Alan Freed introduces Gene Vincent and his Blue Caps -- Hound Dog (Gene Vincent and his Blue Caps) -- Alan Freed introduces Gene Vincent and his Blue Caps -- Be-Bop-A-Lula (Gene Vincent and his Blue Caps) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Alan Freed introduces Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and the orchestra -- Little Skip (Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and orchestra) -- Closing statement (Alan Freed) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Bern Bennett) -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company; Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program); Freed, Alan; Bennett, Bern, 1921-2014; Taylor, Sam; Burnette, Johnny; Johnny Burnette Trio; Williams, Otis; Charms (Musical group); Vincent, Gene, 1935-1971; Blue Caps (Musical group); Melamed, Louis
